Name: Twin Roads
About the game: Enjoy a calm but challenging adventure exploring a beautiful dream world. Our hero Finn got lost, guide him and his friends to freedom! Relaxing but intense challenges. Travel through islands with different environments and beautiful music. Key Features: Long gameplay and replayable levels. Unlockeable characters with unique abilities that can be upgraded. Hidden treasures. Unique levels, different ways to finish some of them. Supports VR Oculus Rift and gamepad. The game can be played in a normal screen or with a Virtual Reality headset. VR support has been enforced to grant confort, avoiding motion sickness as much as possible.
Meta Title: Twin Roads: Jul 5, 2017, WarPI Games and Full Overview
